text: James Ross Turpin (born 18 March 1997) is an English cricketer. Turpin is a right-arm medium bowler and right-handed batsman. He was born in Fowey, Cornwall, England. Turpin made his first-class debut for Cardiff MCCU against Hampshire in April 2016. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:English cricketers Category:Cornwall cricketers Category:Cardiff MCCU cricketers
title: James Turpin (cricketer)
